00027 //
00028 // This class supports loading BlockFiles in one of the old
00029 // Audacity BlockFile formats (versions 0.98 through 1.0, or
00030 // versions 1.1.0 through 1.1.2).  You can load a BlockFile
00031 // in this format, and you can save information about it
00032 // back to disk, but you can't create a new one from new
00033 // sample data.
00034 //
00035 class LegacyBlockFile : public BlockFile {
00036  public:
00037 
00038    // Constructor / Destructor
00039 
00041    LegacyBlockFile(wxFileName existingFile,
00042                    sampleFormat format,
00043                    sampleCount summaryLen,
00044                    sampleCount len,
00045                    bool noRMS);
00046    virtual ~LegacyBlockFile();
00047 
00048    // Reading
00049 
00051    virtual bool ReadSummary(void *data);
00053    virtual int ReadData(samplePtr data, sampleFormat format,
00054                         sampleCount start, sampleCount len);
00055 
00057    virtual BlockFile *Copy(wxFileName newFileName);
00059    virtual void SaveXML(XMLWriter &xmlFile);
00060    virtual wxLongLong GetSpaceUsage();
00061    virtual void Recover();
00062 
00063    static BlockFile *BuildFromXML(wxString dir, const wxChar **attrs,
00064                                   sampleCount len,
00065                                   sampleFormat format);
00066 
00067  protected:
00068    sampleFormat mFormat;
00069 };
00070 
00071 #endif // __AUDACITY_LEGACY_BLOCKFILE__
